description: This file is a Flutter application's main entry point, defining the app widget and home page with a simple centered progress indicator.

classes.name: MyApp
classes.description: Stateless widget that sets up the MaterialApp with theme and home page.

classes.name: MyHomePage
classes.description: Stateful widget representing the home page with a title.

classes.name: _MyHomePageState
classes.description: State class for MyHomePage that builds the scaffold with app bar and centered content.

methods.name: main
methods.description: Entry point of the Flutter application, runs MyApp.

methods.name: build (MyApp)
methods.description: Builds the MaterialApp widget with theme and home page.

methods.name: build (MyHomePage)
methods.description: Builds the home page's scaffold containing app bar and body.

methods.name: build (_MyHomePageState)
methods.description: Returns the widget tree for the home page with a progress indicator.
